item.title: Prepare inquiry
item.description: Collect information before contacting support In a first step the after sales team member needs to know the serial number of the affected machine. In case of an electrical or software issue, it can be found in the main control cabinet on the most left door inside. See image below. An example for a serial number could be 12345-A1. item.title: Remote servicing
item.description: Let a software engineer check your machine remotely Most Pamasol machines are equipped with a secure industrial remote access device. In many cases it is as blue colored unit with the label “EWON” or “VIPA” that can be found in the main control cabinet. The following picture shows the modem which acts as VPN router. Locate this device in your control cabinet and provide internet connection via Ethernet cable if it hasn’t been done already.
